item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: BROOKLYN KEY FEATURES
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-tablet" headline="Responsive" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] BROOKLYN ist fully responsive and perfectly fits on any device.[/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-search-plus" headline="Retina Ready" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN automatically creates retina ready images. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-font" headline="Typography" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] The art and technique of arranging type in order to make language visible. With our build in Font Manager you give your website the final touch. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-cog" headline="Shortcodes" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] Can make website design much easier and with our shortcode manager you can now create them even faster. Choose your desired shortcode and the manager will insert it for you.[/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-code" headline="Clean Code" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] BROOKLYN has been built with the latest submission requirements based on the WordPres Codex, everything is working as intended. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-archive" headline="Dummy Content" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN contains our unique One Click Demo Importer for a quick and easy setup. No need to deal with XML files![/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-columns" headline="One-Page or Multi-Page" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] BROOKLYN is mainly a one page theme, but you can easily turn it into a multi page WordPress theme. Updates and support included!.[/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-clipboard" headline="Post Formats" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN supports the following post formats: Standard, Image, Video, Quote, Link, Gallery[/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-picture-o" headline="Parallax Sections" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] You can create as many sections as you like, with or without paralaxx, it's up to you! BROOKLYN does not limit your imagination,see our 8 demos.[/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-road" headline="Section Backgrounds" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN gives you the freedom to style each section individually. Easily change colors, images, content, fonts, margins and much more without the need to touch a single line of code.[/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-bars" headline="Navigation Styling" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] BROOKLYN provides 4 different navigation styles out of the box. Simply choose your favorite one directly inside the theme options panel. All WordPress native settings of course are supported e.g. drop down menu or custom links. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-text-width" headline="Section Header" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN provides 7 different header styles out of the box. With the help of the built in section settings, you can easily style each section header individually. Everything is right in front your fingertips, change styles or colors within seconds, or even hide the header without the need to touch a single line of code. With these simply options you can give your site an unique touch![/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-rocket" headline="Hero Unit" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] BROOKLYN provides 10 pre defined Hero Title styles out of the box [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-envelope-o" headline="Contact Section" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN allows you to place a contact form on each page, that makes it quite easy for your customers to get in touch with your company. [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-sitemap" headline="Portfolio" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] Present your work to the crowd, with our portfolio management you can easily create your own showcase so that everyone is able to find and see your work on the web! [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-globe" headline="Translation" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN is fully translation ready. We recommend to use WPML, the most popular and professional translation plugin on the market.[/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-users" headline="Members" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] BROOKLYN provides an easy team management. Add as many team members as you need and choose between 3 pre defined styles to present them on your site [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-facebook" headline="Social" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN Social Media becomes an inherent part of our life, share you social media profiles with lots of retina ready icons like Facebook, Twitter, Xing, Instagram, LinkedIn etc.[/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-money" headline="Revolution Slider" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] BROOKLYN includes a $15 value slider that is comong for free when you purchase the theme, add unlimited slides and create stunning animations to get your customers attention when they enter your brand new brooklyn powered website! [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-flag" headline="Font Awesome Icons" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN contains 365 Retina Ready Font Awesome icons. Choose between Web Application, Form Control, Currency, Text Editor , Directional, Video Player, Brand and even Medical icons. We are sure, this set of icons will cover all your needs! [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-comments-o" headline="Support" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="right" width="half" effect="fadeInLeft" last="false"] We consider support as important as our theme development. If you need help, get all of your questions answered quickly with exclusive access to our dedicated support forum. We are delivering support from Monday to Friday [/ut_service_column] [ut_service_column color="#222222" icon="fa-thumbs-up" headline="Updates" margin_bottom="20" shape="normal" align="left" width="half" effect="fadeInRight" last="true"] BROOKLYN since release we continuously added new features and demos one the whole 6 updates within less than 2 month! And be sure that more will come! [/ut_service_column]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The one and only WordPress theme you'll ever have to buy. No run of the mill, elementary professional with unlimited faces! Built with profession and love from a dedicated elite author.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

I came to your page and noticed you could have a lot more traffic. I have found that the key to running a popular website is making sure the visitors you are getting are interested in your niche. There is a company that you can get visitors from and they let you try the service for free. I managed to get over 300 targeted visitors to day to my website. Visit them today: http://go.pigmeu.net/6fX

This is a message to the admin. Your website is missing out on at least 300 visitors per day. I have found a company which offers to dramatically increase your traffic to your website: http://monurl.ca/85kk They offer 1,000 free visitors during their free trial period and I managed to get over 30,000 visitors per month using their services, you could also get lot more targeted visitors than you have now. Hope this helps :) Take care.
